title: CreateMyBill
description: A robust bill creation system Using React js and Firebase.Allows users to effortlessly create, view, and print bills.

title: E-student Portal
description: Developed a dynamic student management module using React.Js, emphasizing frontend design and JavaScript.

title: To-do Web app
description: Engineered a user-friendly to-do list web application leveraging React for dynamic frontend interactions and Node.js with Express.js.

title: Quiz App
description: Developed and deployed a comprehensive quiz application allowing users to create, manage, and participate in quizzes using React for frontend interactions and Node.js with Express.js for backend logic.

title: Refer Earn
description: Designed and implemented a 'Refer and Earn' program on a website, driving user engagement and increasing customer acquisition through strategic program design and user-friendly interface.
